Been on a Hindu "kick" recently (as seen below).  My favorite back ...... :)


Specifically the last 3 SLs I need -- Ellam, Foster, Mullaney.

In general, anything I don't already have (sitting at 70 right now).

I'd be looking for lower grade.  So not to waste anyone's time, my price range would be up to $400 on commons, and up to $700 on HOF/SL.

All I have to trade is on my ebay -- sg713.


[url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]


Thanks, Scott
